alert.note: Alert for Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 9:39PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Areas of moderate to heavy rain will impact portions of eastern Fallon County through 1030 PM MDT... At 933 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated an area of moderate rain continued over eastern Fallon County. Areas have already received up to 0.75 inches of rainfall. HAZARD...Heavy rain and possibly pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of water on roadways along with minor flooding of culverts and ditches. Locations impacted include... Baker, Plevna, Webster and Willard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
